issue.message: Use of this function is discouraged because it makes internal calls to `getIdentifier()`, which uses resource reflection. Reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resource values by identifier (e.g. `getValue(R.foo.bar, outValue, true)`) than by name (e.g. `getValue("foo", outvalue, true)`).

Use of this function is discouraged because it makes internal calls to `getIdentifier()`, which uses resource reflection. Reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resource values by identifier (e.g. `getValue(R.foo.bar, outValue, true)`) than by name (e.g. `getValue("foo", outvalue, true)`).
